DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare two popular portable sleep monitoring devices—the Fitbit Charge® , Jawbone UP® , SleepTime smartphone app—to `` gold standard '' Polysomnography ( PSG ) . Parameters analyze include sleep onset latency , sleep efficiency , sleep staging . Specifically , study investigate validity Jawbone UP® , Fitbit Charge® , SleepTime app detect sleep wakefulness comparison conventional Polysomnography ( PSG ) .
DOC.brief_title: Mainstream Sleep Tracking Devices v Polysomnography
DOC.criteria: Patients undergo Polysomnography severe sleep apnea severe insomnia less two hour sleep per night epileptiform activity electrical status epilepticus sleep
